title: Why Does Twitter Verify Some Accounts?
description: Elon Musk, who recently closed a deal to acquire the social media company, could soon charge a monthly fee for the blue verification badge that indicates a Twitter account is authentic.
dc:creator: Amanda Holpuch
category: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention
media:description: Elon Musk is considering charging $8 to $20 a month to verify Twitter accounts.
